chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
server: nid
clients: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (server \notin clients)
Huniq: is_true (uniq clients)
the_tag: nat
prec: server_state -> nid -> seq nid -> Prop
prec_safe: forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : server_state) (m : seq nid), HServ this to -> prec s to m -> coh_msg {| content := {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} (current_epoch s)
to: nid
this: nid
d: dstatelet
m: seq nat

Goal:
server_send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes /\ to \in nodes

Premises:
current_epoch = fun s : server_state => let (_, current_epoch, _) := s in current_epoch : server_state -> nat
tms_cont = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (_, tms_cont) := t in tms_cont : TaggedMessage -> seq nat tms_cont is a coercion
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
active : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> bool
nodes = [:: server] ++ clients : seq nid
coh_msg = fun (pkt : msg TaggedMessage) (e : nat_eqType) => if from pkt == server then to pkt \in clients /\ msg_from_server (content pkt) e else if from pkt \in clients then to pkt == server /\ msg_from_client (content pkt) else False : msg TaggedMessage -> nat_eqType -> Prop
content : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> mtype
Record server_state : Set := ServerState { outstanding : seq nid; current_epoch : nat; current_holder : option nid } Arguments ServerState _%seq_scope _%nat_scope
server_send_safe = fun (this n : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat) => HServ this n /\ (exists C : coh d, prec (getSt_server C) n msg) : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop Arguments server_send_safe _ _ _ _%seq_scope
Notation seq := list
from : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> nat
tag = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (tag, _) := t in tag : TaggedMessage -> nat
HServ = fun this to : nat_eqType => this == server /\ to \in clients : nat_eqType -> nat_eqType -> Prop
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
uniq : seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nid -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : server_state) (m : seq nid), HServ this to -> prec s to m -> coh_msg {| content := {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} (current_epoch s) this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- eqType]
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
nid = nat : Set
find_some : find ?k ?f = Some ?v -> ?k \in dom ?f where ?K : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nid -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : server_state) (m : seq nid), HServ this to -> prec s to m ->...-> coh_msg {| content := {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} (current_epoch s) this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- UMC.sort ?U]
find_none : find ?k ?f = None -> ?k \notin dom ?f where ?K : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nid -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : server_state) (m : seq nid), HServ this to -> prec s to m ->...-> coh_msg {| content := {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} (current_epoch s) this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- UMC.sort ?U]
findPt_inv : find ?k1 (pts ?k2 ?v) = Some ?w -> [/\ ?k1 = ?k2, ?v = ?w & cond ?U ?k2] where ?K : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nid -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : server_state) (m : seq nid), HServ this to -> prec s to m ->...-> coh_msg {| content := {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} (current_epoch s) this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- ?V]
pts : ?K -> ?V -> ?cT where ?K : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nid -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : server_state) (m : seq nid), HServ this to -> prec s to m ->...-> coh_msg {| content := {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} (current_epoch s) this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- union_map_class ?K ?V]

dyn_tp : {x : ?A & ?P x} -> ?A where ?A : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nid -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : server_state) (m : seq nid), HServ this to -> prec s to m -> coh_msg {| content := {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} (current_epoch s) this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat |- Type] ?P : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nid ->...-> Type]
